bill.title: Relating to unemployment insurance; declaring an emergency.
bill.description: Authorizes Director of Employment Department to study alternative arrangements by which employers may make tax payments required under unemployment insurance law. Authorizes Director of Employment Department to study alternative arrangements by which employers may make tax payments required under unemployment insurance law. Requires director to submit report of any study conducted to interim committees of Legislative Assembly related to employment not later than December 1, 2023. Declares emergency, effective on passage.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
